org.ff4j.cache

Class InMemoryCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.cache.InMemoryCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FF4JCacheManager

    public class InMemoryCacheManager
extends Object
implements FF4JCacheManager
    Proposition of inmemory cache implementation. Warn : DO NOT USE THIS CACHE WHEN WORKING WITH EXTERNAL FEATURESTORE (as Database) and cluster application : EACH NODE GOT ITS MEMORY AND AN MODIFICATION IN STORE WON'T REFRESH THIS CACHE. Please use REDIS/MEMCACHED implementations.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_CACHENAME
      cache name if several caches within memory.

        public void evictFeature(String featureId)
